## Bio

Cameron Jester is a sophomore Data Science and Analytics student at Simmons University with a minor in Economics. She is from New Hampshire, and currently resides in Boston, Massachusetts. In school, she enjoys creating informative visuals using RStudio, learning and applying statistical methods to real-world data, and discussing economic theories. Outside of school, Cameron is passionate about exploring the outdoors, watching sports, and perfecting the art of making coffee.
